item.title: MUC Slow mode
item.description: The livechat plugin includes a “slow mode” feature, to rate limit the number of messages that a user can send to a given MUC room. At time of writing, there were no XEP to describe such feature. Please find below a XEP draft, that will be submitted for review. Work In Progress, this page is not done yet. XEP: MUC Slow Mode Abstract: This specification describes a way to rate limit messages a single user can send to a MUC room, from the room configuration to the server and client handling of such a feature.
